//0011_1100

1010_0001

256


1_0101_1010
^
0_0011_1100


1_0110_0110
>>
0_1011_0011


1_0110_0110
<<
0_1100_1100



   $
M     $
    I   S

MIS

1$0M1$0I0S

1, 0'0100_1101, 1, 0'0100_1001, 0'0101_0011

MISS

001[1 bit of padding at the end!]!0000_0011[tree has three leaves!]110010011011001001001001010011[tree is built!]01011110

   I  S

1,0M,1,0I,0S
